name: 王明展
objective: This course will mainly introduzce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning. Material handling and site selection are also included.
schedule:
Week     Topic
  1    Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management
 2~3   Manufacturing Process & Automation System製造程序與自動化系統
 4~5   Work Study and Human Engineering工作研究與人因工程
  6    Facility Planning and Layout設施規畫與佈置
  7    Quality Management品質管理
  8    Production Management生產計畫與管制
  9    Midterm Examination
  10   Material & Supply Chain Management物料管理與供應鏈管理
  11   Business Lecture
  12   Material & Supply Chain Management物料管理與供應鏈管理
  13   Engineering Economic工程經濟
  14   Operation Research作業研究
15~16  Enterprise Resource Planning 企業資源規畫
  17   Others Topics其他相關課題
  18   Final Examination
